verses.verse: Now the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> that he should <S%H4191>die;<s%> and he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"I am <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%> You be <S%H2388>strong<s%> <S%H376>therefore,<s%> and show yourself a man;

and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>instruction<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> his <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and his <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> according to that which is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> that you may <S%H7919>prosper<s%> in all that you <S%H6213>do,<s%> and wherever you turn <S%H6437>yourself.<s%>

That <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> may <S%H6965>establish<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> concerning <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H1121><s%> 'If your children take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H1870>way,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H571>truth<s%> with all their <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all their <S%H5315>soul,<s%> there shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%>' he said, <S%H376><s%> 'a man on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

"Moreover you <S%H3045>know<s%> also what <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H6213>me,<s%> even what he did to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> and to <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3500>Jether,<s%> whom he <S%H2026>killed,<s%> and <S%H7760>shed<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> on his <S%H2290>sash<s%> that was about his <S%H4975>waist,<s%> and in his <S%H5275>shoes<s%> that were on his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
<S%H6213>Do<s%> therefore according to your <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H7872>don't<s%> let his gray head go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

But <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite,<s%> and let them be of those who <S%H398>eat<s%> at your <S%H7979>table;<s%> for so they <S%H7126>came<s%> to me when I <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H1272>from<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> your <S%H251>brother.<s%>

<S%H8096>"Behold,<s%> there is with you Shimei the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> the <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> of <S%H980>Bahurim,<s%> who <S%H7043>cursed<s%> me with a <S%H4834>grievous<s%> <S%H7045>curse<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H4266>Mahanaim;<s%> but he came <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me at the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4191><s%> 'I will not put you to death with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>'

Now therefore <S%H5352>don't<s%> hold him guiltless, for you are a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> what you ought to <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H7872>him,<s%> and you shall bring his gray head <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%>"
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

The <S%H3117>days<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> was <S%H3966>firmly<s%> <S%H3559>established.<s%>

Then <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%> She <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>"Peaceably.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1697>moreover,<s%> I have something to tell <S%H1697>you.<s%>" She said, "Say <S%H1696>on.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> was <S%H3478>mine,<s%> and that all Israel <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> on <S%H4427>me,<s%> that I should reign. However the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> is turned <S%H5437>around,<s%> and has become my <S%H251>brother<s%>'s; for it was his from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Now I <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7596>petition<s%> of <S%H7725>you.<s%> Don't deny <S%H6440>me.<s%>" She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1696>him,<s%> "Say on."

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> (for he will not <S%H7725>tell<s%> <S%H6440>you<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'no'), that he <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>"
<S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2896>"Alright.<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> for you to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

<S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> therefore <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him for <S%H138>Adonijah.<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7812>her,<s%> and bowed himself to <S%H3427>her,<s%> and sat down on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and caused a <S%H3678>throne<s%> to be <S%H7760>set<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H517>mother;<s%> and she <S%H7760>sat<s%> on his right <S%H3225>hand.<s%>

Then she <S%H7592>said,<s%> "I ask <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H7596>petition<s%> of <S%H7725>you;<s%> don't <S%H7725>deny<s%> <S%H6440>me.<s%>" The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7725>said<s%> to <S%H7725>her,<s%> "Ask <S%H7592>on,<s%> my <S%H517>mother;<s%> for I <S%H7725>will<s%> not <S%H7725>deny<s%> <S%H6440>you.<s%>"
She <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> "Why do you <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> for <S%H138>Adonijah?<s%> <S%H7592>Ask<s%> for him the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> <S%H1419>also;<s%> for he is my elder <S%H251>brother;<s%> even for <S%H54>him,<s%> and for Abiathar the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and for <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah.<s%>"

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> so to <S%H3254>me,<s%> and more also, if <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> against his own <S%H5315>life.<s%>

Now therefore as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who has <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H3427>me,<s%> and set me on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and who has <S%H6213>made<s%> me a <S%H1004>house,<s%> as he <S%H1696>promised,<s%> surely <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada;<s%> and he <S%H6293>fell<s%> on <S%H4191>him,<s%> so that he died.

To <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> to <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> to your own <S%H7704>fields;<s%> for you are <S%H376>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%> But I will not at this <S%H3117>time<s%> put you to <S%H4191>death,<s%> because you <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and because you were <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> in all in which my <S%H1>father<s%> was <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>"

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> thrust <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> from being <S%H3548>priest<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that he might <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>

The <S%H8052>news<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab;<s%> for <S%H3097>Joab<s%> had <S%H5186>turned<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah,<s%> though he <S%H5186>didn't<s%> turn <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H53>Absalom.<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and caught <S%H2388>hold<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

It was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H3097>"Joab<s%> has <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H681>behold,<s%> he is by the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>" Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> fall on <S%H6293>him.<s%>"

<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3318><s%> 'Come forth!'" He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4191>"No;<s%> but I will die <S%H1141>here.<s%>" Benaiah <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Thus <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and thus he answered <S%H1696>me.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>him,<s%> "Do as he has <S%H559>said,<s%> and <S%H6293>fall<s%> on <S%H6912>him,<s%> and bury <S%H5493>him;<s%> that you may take away the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> which <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H8210>shed<s%> without <S%H2600>cause,<s%> from me and from my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head,<s%> because he <S%H6293>fell<s%> on <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> more <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2026>he,<s%> and killed them with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know <S%H74>it:<s%> Abner the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3500>Jether,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

So shall their <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> But to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and to his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and to his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> there shall be <S%H7965%H99999>peace<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

Then <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H6293>fell<s%> on <S%H4191>him,<s%> and killed <S%H6912>him;<s%> and he was buried in his own <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> in his place over the <S%H6635>army;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> in the place of <S%H54>Abiathar.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1129>him,<s%> "Build yourself a <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3318>there,<s%> and don't go out from there <S%H575>anywhere.<s%>

For on the <S%H3117>day<s%> you go <S%H3318>out,<s%> and pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> for <S%H3045>certain<s%> that you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die:<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on your own <S%H7218>head.<s%>"

<S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "The <S%H559>saying<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> As my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1696>said,<s%> so will your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6213>do.<s%>" <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

It happened at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> that <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> ran <S%H1272>away<s%> to <S%H397>Achish,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%> They <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5650>"Behold,<s%> your servants are in <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>"

<S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath<s%> to <S%H397>Achish,<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> from <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>
It was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> that <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> had <S%H1980>gone<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and had come <S%H7725>again.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7650>him,<s%> "Didn't I adjure you by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5749>warn<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H3045><s%> 'Know for <S%H3045>certain,<s%> that on the <S%H3117>day<s%> you go <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> abroad any <S%H575>where,<s%> you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die?<s%>' You <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1697>me,<s%> 'The saying that I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%>'
